content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Robert. Could you please provide the address where the HVAC service is needed?
Thank you. Let me just check if that is within our service area.
Good news, Robert! We do service your area. When would be an ideal time for you to have a technician come by?
I’m not sure yet. I want to check with a couple other companies and see what quotes I get first.
I understand, Robert. It’s always smart to compare. If you decide to go ahead with us, just let me know and I’ll be happy to help schedule you at your convenience.
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies first
